channel.title: XML Historical Foreign Exchange Rates for Indonesian Rupiah (IDR) (15 Sep 2021)
channel.description: XML historical foreign exchange rates for Indonesian Rupiah (IDR) from the Float Rates. Published at 15 Sep 2021.

item.title: 1 IDR = 0.038980 XOF
